ai-patthana23.49:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.49:1.1_0: Not in action, resenting, or not longing for that state,
ai-patthana23.49:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.49:2.1_0: Not for the enjoyment of his resentment, not for the sake of non-existence, nor repulsion, because of failure in view.
ai-patthana23.49:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.49:3.1_0: Neither have no longer only underlying tendency to repulsion. Neither with the trainees, nor does he give rise to the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind.
